title: 20 electric scooters from Jitendra EV catch fire in Nashik, no casualties reported
description: The container had 40 scooters in all and half of them in the upper tier caught fire. No casualties were reported. "An unfortunate incident took place on 9th April near our factory gate in a scooter transport container," the company said in a statement to ETAuto.
